title: When casting Jhin's ult on the minimap, Jhin will face the cursor rather than the spot you chose...
body: I like to use the minimap for targetting long range abilities like Cait's ult and Ziggs' ulti, but whenever I try this as Jhin, I end up casting Curtain Call towards the minimap than from the location I picked on the minimap. AFAIK this is the only skill that shows an indicator on the minimap that functions like this. Is this a bug?

replies.body: Its because they dont want people accidentally firing say to toplane then they are trying to fire at botlane because they accidentally clicked the minimap
I also hate Aurelion's Q going backwards or diagonal when i'm trying to make it go with my E. Atleast give us an option to use certain abilities on the minimap
